Low Testosterone In Men Affects Heart Health, Raises Risk Of Death: Study https://www.medicaldaily.com/low-testosterone-men-affects-heart-health-raises-risk-death-study-471736 Men who have testosterone levels below the normal range are at a 40 percent higher risk of death from all causes, and those with extremely low T are at a 60% higher risk of death from heart disease. https://www.medicaldaily.com/low-testosterone-men-affects-heart-health-raises-risk-death-study-471736 Tue, 14 May 2024 01:49:02 -0400
